name: Lighthouse (Nick Feofentov)
description:
I wonder what it feels like: running out of space in seeming endless ocean? Guess I’ll find out today.

I was told that the Cliffy Coast Lighthouse is broken. The worst place on Earth to land during the storm…

Gameplay

Get to the Lighthouse. Avoid cliffs.

WASD/Arrows/Left Stick

Credits

Music - Mike Sovin

Code - Nick Feofentov

Art - Anastasiia Klieshchova

Streams/Videos:
